headline: How Dividend Expectations And Pricing Power At Coca-Cola (KO) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Coca-Cola has drawn fresh attention as investors look ahead to its February 10 fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 earnings release, focusing on pricing, margins, and the balance between volume and affordability across global markets. Expectations for what could be the company’s 64th consecutive dividend increase, potentially its largest since 2007, are reinforcing Coca-Cola’s appeal as both an income and defensive consumer stock supported by recent earnings strength, higher operating margins,...
